programme.title: Playmaker
programme.desc: A former footballer and jailbird, Ivo is no longer interested in football. That is until he meets Lukas, a talented young player, and decides to help him pursue a professional career. But his criminal past soon catches up with him.

programme.title: I'm Not In Love
programme.desc: After receiving a marriage ultimatum from a woman he's not sure he truly loves, Rob is up against the clock to realise he should stop looking for the fabled 'Miss Right' and learn to see what's right in front of him.

programme.title: Murder. Money. Zurich. III - Borchert and the Last Hope
programme.desc: Thomas Borchert, an “unlicensed attorney” is consulted by the family of architect Anton Schenider who died from Multiple Sclerosis. The family suspects malpractice on the part of his neurologist, but the autopsy creates more questions than answers.

programme.title: Helen Dorn: Breathless
programme.desc: In an illegal arms case, three men, including two policemen, are dead. Mattheisen reveals a radical right-wing conspiracy, and suspects a mole. However, he is shot dead with Inspector Dorn’s weapon, while Dorn is found at the crime scene with no memory.

programme.title: Paris La Blanche
programme.desc: In this parable of migration, Rekia, 70 years-old, leaves Kabylie for Paris to fetch her husband, Nour, back home. Nour has been sustaining the family from abroad for 40 years. Finding help in new friends, she finds Nour but he is a changed man.

programme.title: Broll: Buried Alive
programme.desc: Gravedigger Max Broll and retired soccer star Baroni team up to find Max’s stepmother Tilda, the local police commissioner, who has been abducted and buried alive in the woods. The clock is ticking – Tilda won`t survive more than 48 hours underground.

programme.title: Roise & Frank
programme.desc: Recently widowed Róise is struggling with her grief following her husband's passing. However, when a stray dog starts to follow her around, she starts to believe that it might be the reincarnation of her husband.

programme.title: M.U.R.B.Y.
programme.desc: In a world where dogs transform into formidable wolves by consuming feathers, Rob, driven by ambition, steals coveted M.U.R.B.Y feathers. However, a gust of wind serves as a twist of fate which sends him on a soul-searching journey of moral dilemmas.

programme.title: Murder. Money. Zurich. IV - Borchert and the Force of Habit
programme.desc: “Lawyer without a license” Thomas Borchert wants to save two confessed burglars from a murder charge. But with the evidence stacked against them, their only hope is to track down the real killer themselves.

programme.title: Stormskerry Maja
programme.desc: At 17, Maja marries humble fisherman Janne and starts a family on the remote island of Stormskerry, where survival is a constant challenge. Amidst the hardships, Maja awakens to her potential, finding resilience and a love that transcends life and death.

programme.title: Helen Dorn: A Little Bit Of Freedom
programme.desc: Haunted by a missing boy's case from 14 years ago, Helen Dorn recently discovers a lead linking to the alleged perpetrator, Ron Faber. Dorn immediately heads for Hamburg when she learns that Faber was apprehended with a deceased Chinese boy in his van.

programme.title: Playmaker
programme.desc: A former footballer and jailbird, Ivo is no longer interested in football. That is until he meets Lukas, a talented young player, and decides to help him pursue a professional career. But his criminal past soon catches up with him.

programme.title: Standing Up For Sunny
programme.desc: When Travis, a self-isolated recluse with low-grade cerebral palsy and anger management issues falls for Sunny, an unassuming comedian, he must take the stage to show his true self and win her love.

programme.title: The Inland Road
programme.desc: After surviving a car crash when running away from home, Tia finds herself having nowhere to go. Seeking out the family of the crash victim, she moves in with them and threatens to upend the family’s delicate balance.

programme.title: Black As The Snow
programme.desc: A serial killer is on the rampage in the ski resort of Morzine-Avoriaz. Vivier, French police officer teams up with the Swiss policeman Meyer to investigate the suspicious deaths of teenagers. They must find the killer before the victim list grows.

programme.title: Gossip
programme.desc: A junior overhears some juicy gossip, but when she attempts to retell it, she falls flat and bores her audience. Frustrated with her lacklustre storytelling skills, a group of seniors take it upon themselves to teach her the art of gossiping.

programme.title: All My Friends Hate Me
programme.desc: Pete is cautiously excited about reuniting with his college crew for a birthday weekend. But, one by one, his friends slowly turn against him. Is he being punished, is he paranoid, or is he part of some sick joke?

programme.title: Broll: Buried Alive
programme.desc: Gravedigger Max Broll and retired soccer star Baroni team up to find Max’s stepmother Tilda, the local police commissioner, who has been abducted and buried alive in the woods. The clock is ticking – Tilda won`t survive more than 48 hours underground.

programme.title: Murder. Money. Zurich. IV - Borchert and the Force of Habit
programme.desc: “Lawyer without a license” Thomas Borchert wants to save two confessed burglars from a murder charge. But with the evidence stacked against them, their only hope is to track down the real killer themselves.

programme.title: Helen Dorn: A Little Bit Of Freedom
programme.desc: Haunted by a missing boy's case from 14 years ago, Helen Dorn recently discovers a lead linking to the alleged perpetrator, Ron Faber. Dorn immediately heads for Hamburg when she learns that Faber was apprehended with a deceased Chinese boy in his van.

programme.title: Standing Up For Sunny
programme.desc: When Travis, a self-isolated recluse with low-grade cerebral palsy and anger management issues falls for Sunny, an unassuming comedian, he must take the stage to show his true self and win her love.

programme.title: Murder by the Lake - The Spook
programme.desc: In an abandoned villa, three children witness a fierce fight between Jakob Stocking and a building contractor. Jakob kills him but returns later with his lawyer to turn himself in. As questions pile up, two detectives uncover a long-kept family secret.

programme.title: Gossip
programme.desc: A junior overhears some juicy gossip, but when she attempts to retell it, she falls flat and bores her audience. Frustrated with her lacklustre storytelling skills, a group of seniors take it upon themselves to teach her the art of gossiping.

programme.title: Black As The Snow
programme.desc: A serial killer is on the rampage in the ski resort of Morzine-Avoriaz. Vivier, French police officer teams up with the Swiss policeman Meyer to investigate the suspicious deaths of teenagers. They must find the killer before the victim list grows.

programme.title: Codename Holec
programme.desc: Honza films the Russian invasion of 1968 in Prague and takes the politically charged movie and actress Eva, the love of his life, on a secret trip to Vienna. There they meet a director who knows Eva very well and the Czech Secret Service even better.

programme.title: The Inland Road
programme.desc: After surviving a car crash when running away from home, Tia finds herself having nowhere to go. Seeking out the family of the crash victim, she moves in with them and threatens to upend the family’s delicate balance.

programme.title: Helen Dorn: The Seeds Of Violence
programme.desc: At the Hamburg DOM festival, Helen Dorn and forensic scientist Weyer witness a paramedic's brutal assault. When a high-society boy is later found dead, unravelling a dark secret linking the two cases.

programme.title: All My Friends Hate Me
programme.desc: Pete is cautiously excited about reuniting with his college crew for a birthday weekend. But, one by one, his friends slowly turn against him. Is he being punished, is he paranoid, or is he part of some sick joke?

programme.title: Veins Of The World
programme.desc: After his father dies in a tragic car accident, 11-year-old Amra sets out to continue his father’s vision of the traditional nomad way of life and to continue his fight against global mining companies who threaten to destroy it.

programme.title: Easy Living
programme.desc: A 14-year-old kid, a young woman who smuggles medicines up and down the Italian border with France and a bizarre American tennis teacher who dreams of being a painter. Their lives take a turn when they meet an illegal migrant.

programme.title: A Butterfly's Heart
programme.desc: Juozapas is a quiet boy who cultivates insects in an abandoned house. He has a big bulge under his weird sweater and the school’s tough kids call him “balloon”. Rugilè moves to town and becomes Juozapas’ friend. She is the first to discover his secret.

programme.title: A Perfect Fit
programme.desc: A big city lawyer with impossible standards, Katharina is sure that carpenter Mike is not the one for her. Though Mike does not meet any of her criteria, there seems to be an unexplainable spark between the unlikely couple.

programme.title: The Wonder Shop (Livestreaming) - Your Snake Year Horoscope: Huat! or What?!
programme.desc: (Live) Embrace the Year of the Snake by exploring your horoscope readings with Kele and our guest, Master Terelyn from SODO Feng Shui! Discover your lucky colours, food, activities, and gain valuable Feng Shui tips.
